1. [Mayor & City Council](https://www.cityofmagnolia.com/mayor-city-council)

Brandon Jacobs
==============

![brandon jacobs headshot](https://www.cityofmagnolia.com/sites/g/files/vyhlif7206/f/styles/news_image/public/people/brandon_jacobs.jpg?itok=oDj0Pz-y)

[Contact Brandon Jacobs](https://www.cityofmagnolia.com/user/916/contact)

Phone:

(936) 276-9670

Brandon Jacobs was elected to Magnolia City Council Position 4 in May 2024. In December 2022, he was appointed as a Director, Position 5, of the Magnolia 4B Community Development Corporation, and currently serves as Vice President of the Corporation.
In 2016, he and his wife Stephanie started their family and wanted to live in a community with a small-town feel and chose Magnolia as their new home.
Brandon earned his bachelor’s degree in civil engineering in 2005 from Michigan Technological University and an MBA with a concentration in Business Decision Making/Monte Carlo simulation from University of Houston in 2011. He began his career working on heavy civil construction projects in California, Pennsylvania, Mississippi, and Houston. After earning his MBA, he moved into Oil and Gas where he continues to support capital project management. His primary focus is on cost, schedule, and risk management.

[bjacobs@cityofmagnolia.com](mailto:bjacobs@cityofmagnolia.com)
